attributes.additional_details: Recent calls to add Staffordshire bull terriers to the dangerous dogs act suggest that this charity actually doesn’t have a clue what it’s going on about and therefor should not be allowed to operate anymore.
attributes.background: This is a so called charity that is supposed to protect animals, yet they are constantly aiding in getting many animals put to sleep and are even proposing we add non dangerous dogs to the dangerous dogs act. It’s a joke.

rejection.details:
You can find out how to make a complaint about a charity here:

https://www.gov.uk/complain-about-charity
